altername_name: Tokyo Twilight Busters: Kindan no Ikenie Teito Jigokuhen
name: Tokyo Twilight Busters
overview: 1923, Tokyo – The Taishou era – Whilst studying abroad in England, Sho Kusanagi receives news that his father - Professor Takuma Kusanagi of the Imperial University - has been reported missing. Sho returns to Japan to uncover the truth behind his father’s disappearance, and is quickly involved with a series of mysterious incidents that have appeared in the capital.
